plot: Three brothers (one who is slow and another who is adopted) have disturbing and violent hallucinations while their mother is at work.
title: Hallucinations
plot_es: Three brothers (one who is slow and another who is adopted) have disturbing and violent hallucinations while their mother is at work.
plot_en: Three brothers (one who is slow and another who is adopted) have disturbing and violent hallucinations while their mother is at work.
